actions.committee: Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Mr. McHugh asked unanimous consent that the Committee on Transportation and Infrustructure be discharged from further consideration of the bill H.R. 1249 and that the bill be rereferred to the Committee on Government Reform and Oversight. Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Rereferred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development

official_title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the "John T. Myers Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the John T. Myers Federal Building.

titles.title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 107 Federal Building, in Terre Haute, Indiana, as the "John T. Myers Federal Building".
